head.title: Metro Briefing | New York: Bronx: Man Fatally Stabbed In A Fight

hedline.hl1: Metro Briefing | New York: Bronx: Man Fatally Stabbed In A Fight

body.head.byline: By THOMAS J. LUECK; Compiled by John Sullivan

block.p: A Bronx man was stabbed to death on Saturday night when an argument he was having with three other men escalated, witnesses told the police. The police said that officers responding to a 911 call found the man, Nasario Santiago Santiago, who they said was in his 20s, in front of 537 East 137th Street in Mott Haven at 9:10 p.m. with several stab wounds to his torso. He was taken to Lincoln Medical and Mental Health Center, where he was pronounced dead. The police said yesterday that there had been no arrests, and that the case remained under investigation.
